page.title: 05Working Mother of Taverham
page.content: 'I get up at 6.30, wash, dress and prepare the breakfast and packed lunches for my family of four. I am a teacher and cycle to school, arriving at 8.10 to check and prepare lessons for the day. I work in the classroom from 9.00 to 3.00 with a 15min break for coffee and 1 hr. for lunch. After school, I shop, prepare the evening meal, do the housework and marking. Then I read, garden, watch TV or talk to my husband and children.'(A.Carter) { Kitchen Gadgets-}Every house has a gas or electric cooker, some micro waves. Most have washing machines but a few still wash by hand. Many have tumble driers, ironing is a chore. Nearly all homes have fridges and freezers to keep food fresh and many use mixers or food processors. Fresh produce is available locally but other foods are bought in bulk and stored.
